Installation¶

This program is designed to run on a particular raspberry pi with particular equipment. For development purposes, run the following command

python setup.py install --user

–user this flag tells setup.py to install into the user’s local bin rather than the system bin.

or

pip install -e --user .

-e this tells pip to create a link to directory files allowing for quick changes. –user this tells pip to install to the user’s local bin rather than the system bin.
